description: It's not full open source. Features are paid only. But good application.

This app is simple & easy to use for splitting and merging pdfs. I typically use openoffice-draw and master pdf editor for making pdfs, but I've found it far easier to use this app to merge & split so I keep it around for that purpose. 
The ability to automatically name the splits is very handy.
summary: My GoTo app for merging and splitting PDFs

description: Fantastic! I was wasting time trying last night trying to get SmallPDF (online merger to take my money so we could make hundreds of reciepts into one for FEMA after the Hermits Peak fire and the USRorest Servicwe burned house in the countery to the ground. The App made it happen in a matter of minutes: Ubuntu 20.04 on a cheap laptop. Hooray!
summary: I can't believe how fast it merges PDFs

description: Crash at start after installation
great great great

Crashes on my system. Might be because the toolkit it assumes is not present on my system.

```
Graphics Device initialization failed for : es2, sw
Error initializing QuantumRenderer: no suitable pipeline found
java.lang.RuntimeException: java.lang.RuntimeException: Error initializing QuantumRenderer: no suitable pipeline found
[...]
java.lang.RuntimeException: No toolkit found
	at com.sun.javafx.tk.Toolkit.getToolkit(Toolkit.java:272)
[...]
``
summary: No toolkit found... No out-of-the-box Java 11+ support?

Nice to work, recommend.

Saved me my behind. Great tool, easy to use. 
Works out of the box ubuntu 18.04 , no fiddling no twerking just awesome *inserting the meme with the guy touching his face*

This is great PDF reader application.
It's an amazing app, I use it almost on daily basis, and haven't faced a single issue.
one of the best pdf editor even in free version.
summary: one of the best pdf editor

description: crash ubuntu 18.04
the paid version is awesome too

Easy to use app with great interface. I sometimes need to extract pages from large pdf's and this app is ideal.
Tip for Drag and Drop: right-click on name of file you want to drag and drop. Click on 'Open with other application'. Click on PDFsam and the application will do the rest.
I have been using this daily for a couple of year at work daily and absolutely love it

I only want to extract some pages from a pdf file. This it does well.

However, it is nagware. Every five uses it says, give me money. I wonder if it stops this nagging when I would give them money. And this makes me look for other software.
summary: Good for what I need it

description: This app has nothing to do on a Debian install. They're advertising for a better paying app. You should install pdfshuffler instead with apt-get.
Worked first two or three times; thereafter does not open at all.

popOS, after you lunched it start at eating your ram until it use all of it and the swap.

the weird thing that system monitor dose not report the process that use all of the ram in the tab process, just the Resource tab show 98 use of ram and swap

great app I use very often on ubuntu and windows. no crash ever, output files as good as input files.
not so bad not so good crashing is the main problem

description: Crash trying to split a 4 pages PDF

Confusing and non-intuitive interface. Seems like it's designed for batch operations on large numbers of PDF files, doesn't seem very useful if you're only working with a couple. 

Only way to specify files is drag'n'drop, doesn't seem to support a file-picker. 

Might be better once you get the hang of it, but if it crashes right out of the box, doesn't seem worth the effort.
GAVNO GAVNO GAVNO

Many times do I need to change a page in the middle of a huge pdf or just grab a single page and send it around. This app does it all. Super easy to use and works flawlessly. Have been using it on Ubuntu 18.04 and 20.04 and Windows. All works great and never had it crashing.
Running Ubuntu 20.04 LTS and all I get is several error messages.

It is a great tool and worth the money to get the enhanced versions.

description: Never got past splash screen.

Installed through the software centre. No pre-req's were listed. The interface is aweful. Terrible. Gave me an error that the target directory was not empty even though there were no name conflicts; a non-emptry directory is neither an error nor worthy of warning. Also, failed to perform the requested task with a long list of Java-related errors; running OpenJDK 11.0.8. If there is a requisite library or if the program requires another program in order to do its job, it should check for it. Self-checking dependencies is trivial. Very disappointing.
summary: Runs, but doesn't perform the job. Seems to have pre-requisites

description: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: javax/validation/ParameterNameProvider
All the features are very useful. Thank you developers. You have done great job.

Much easier to use and smaller than even ADOBE ACROBAT. But also free. Extra easy to use. Can highly recommend it!
Super fast and easy to use
I needed an app to merge multiple pdf files, and this app did the job perfectly.

I use an external screen (32``). When I launch the app it opens on the laptop screen, which is not primary. When I drag the app to the external screen everything is extremely small. Unpossible to work.

Ubuntu 20.04
The version installed from Ubuntu Software crashes on load...

The version downloaded rom their website is brilliant.
Merge allows to 1. add page numbers, 2. add a foornote with the source filename, 3. create a table of content.
Split allows to split based on maximum filesize of each part.
Really great.
I loved it I really wanted to merge pdf files and was sick of online tools
Performs the pdf page-extraction, split and merge perfectly. Great interface.

Unforeutely this application didn't install correctly when I used the Ubuntu Software installer. It gave no errors during installation, and only briefly flashed up something when run. Further investigation found that there were JavaFX errors however these did not appear easy to fix. The appropriate dependencies were not resolved during installation.

Running Ubuntu 21.04, this program seemed to have performance issues from the minute I installed it (very jumpy mouse response, slow to respond), and the minute I tried to split 1 page from a 16 page PDF, the entire system crashed. Trying something else.

good job the app works perfectly and it's really easy to use regards from Argentina!!
Crashed my Ubuntu 21, not worth the install

I just needed to split a pdf into several pieces in different folders and this worked great. Fast, intutive and all the tools I needed right at hand. Running KUbuntu 20.04 on an old box and it was seemless.
summary: Worked great for what I needed

description: Super easy usage. Thanks.

I tried this when I ran out of patience with PDF Arranger as a splitting tool. So far I've only tried splitting. The interface combines sensible options & prompts with reasonable simplicity. The output was easy to produce in the form & location I wanted. A brief exploration of other facilities such as merge looks similarly promising. Definitely worth a trial.
summary: Does the job sensibly with good interface design

description: Perfectly worked for me! Thank you!
I think it is the best free app around to manipulate PDFS. Simple but good.
crashes on opening.

Das Programm in der Basis-Variante schafft es ein Dokument an das Andere zu hängen, bei einem Lesezeichen die Datei in zwei zu zerteilen und in einem Dokument Seiten zu rotieren.
Tolle Leistung... das kann jedes andere PDF-Programm in den Basisfunktionen auch.
Wer mehr will, müsste bei diesem Programm auf die Kauf-Variante umsteigen, welche einen jährlichen Satz von gerundet 50€ verlangt.
Ich weiß zwar nicht, wie sich das rechtfertigt, aber eine normale Version im Sinne von einmal kaufen, für immer besitzen wäre doch etwas freundlicher, wenn man schon Geld dafür verlangen will.
Auf jeden Fall ist selbst der Abo-Preis zu überteuert!

Installiere dir das Programm erst garnicht, wenn du die wirklichen Basics auch mit anderen Programmen erledigen kannst. Spare dir die Zeit und den Speicherplatz.
nach kurzer Zeit legt das Programm meinen ganzen Laptop lahm, sodass er im Prinzip unbenutzbar wird. Nur Neustart schafft dann Abhilfe
summary: lässt PC langsam werden, sodass Neustart erforderlich ist

description: Da ich sie nicht testen kann, gibt es auch nur einen Stern, wobei noch der zu viel wäre.

Version 4.04 unter Kubuntu 20.04 läuft permanent auf eiinen Java-Fehler und lässt sich nicht zum Arbeiten bewegen. Dann lieber etwas Anderes .... (Der Pflicht-Stern steht wohl als Lob für die bloße Exictenz???)
so I cannot evaluate it

Kann mich den negativen Meinungen nicht anschließen. Funktioniert hervorragend bei mir, und ich kann nicht nur in 2 teilen oder anhängen, ich kann auch in beliebiger Reihenfolge aus mehreren PDFs eine neue erstellen. Für mich ein sehr gutes Tool, dass ich seit Jahren nutze.
startet einfach nicht!

Der Funktionsumfang zumindest der Basic Variante ist wirklich minimal und so viel mehr kann die Premium Variante nicht, dass ich da Geld für ausgeben würde. Das lohnt sich einfach hinten und vorne nicht, da gibt es bedeutend besseres.
Außerdem macht es bei mir einfach nichts mehr. Wenn zum Beispiel Zusammenführen auswähle und das dann starte, steht da einfach nur angefordert und es passiert nichts. Kann aber sein, dass es an Ubuntu 20.04 liegt, daher noch den zweiten Stern.
Die Bedienung ist nicht intuitiv.

description: Lo instalé para unir un par de pdfs, pero da error por algún motivo que desconozco.
Muy intuitiva y con muchas opciones, mas de las que necesito.
Muy útil si trabajas con ficheros pdf, combinandolos, insertando/eliminando páginas. Recomendable.

Imagino que las opiniones de una o dos estrellas son por errores de instalación o algo así, no por la experiencia con la app en sí. Porque va muy bien, es sencilla de usar y me sirve para todo lo que quiero (fusionar PDFs ordenándolos y con múltiples opciones, partir PDFs...)
Permite muchas funcionalidades y es muy intuitivo. A mi me ha funcionado perfectamente y es uno de mis preferidos.
Hace su labor de forma rápida. Varias opciones de trabajo. Absolutamente intuitivo.

Acabo de instalarla para unir varios documentos en un solo archivo. Si lo que requiere es algo que funcione con un ratón y clics, es esta una buena opción . Aún debo revisar las otras utilidades. De todos modos, no olvidar que existen opciones en la línea de comandos como pdftk .
El programa tiene algunas funciones gratuitas pero otras de pago para que lo tengan en cuenta.
plante l'ordi dès l'ouverture
On ne peut maintenant plus faire grand-chose avec le logiciel, qui fait payer ses fonctionnalités les plus intéressantes. Déception.

je conseille pour sa simplicité et les paramètres permettant une utilisation plus fine
Fonctionne parfaitement pour moi. Interface simple, et résultat hyper rapide

J'utilise souvent ce logiciel qui fonctionne très bien sous Debian 10.4. Pratique, simple, rapide et efficace.

description: je l'utilise surtout pour extraire des pages de lourds fichiers, sur une version Windows et une autre sous Ubuntu21.04 . Je n'ai jamais rencontré de problèmes. Je reproche juste que l'affichage des miniatures des pages faciliterait la vie de l'utilisateur, plutôt que d'avoir à jongler avec le visionneur de PDS.

Быстро справляется с объединением, разделением, чередованием, поворотом, извлечением страниц в PDF документах (в том числе большого объема). Спасибо разработчикам. Рекомендую.
